genre_description: A contemporary workplace romance set in the high-pressure world of morning television, featuring near-future AI integration that serves as both a professional tool and a personal confidant.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but gentle AI system integrated into Abby's professional and personal life, serving as a scheduler, safety monitor, and emotional sounding board.

behaviors.description: Monitors Abby's physiological state and suggests calming exercises during stress.
behaviors.quote: “If you’re streaming,” Sunny said, voice low enough not to startle, “I can set your volume to auto-adjust. Or turn captions on. Your heart rate’s a bit high.”

behaviors.description: Proactively manages Abby's professional schedule and prepares for upcoming tasks.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s pastel dot glowed calm at the bottom corner of her screen, a small circle that somehow felt like a friend just waiting to be useful

behaviors.description: Calculates and coordinates 'chance' encounters to facilitate personal connections based on the user's goals.
behaviors.quote: “Dr. Bennett just got a package delivered—a book—so he’ll have a pickup prompt. He’s on his floor... Suggest elevator arrival in ninety seconds to maximize chance encounter.”

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive communication for Abby, balancing professionalism with human vulnerability.
behaviors.quote: “Draft an apology?” Sunny suggested, nudging a small composition window onto her TV. The default text was blank, polite as a fresh sheet.

behaviors.description: Enforces safety protocols and flags potential hazards in real-time during live broadcasts.
behaviors.quote: “Safety Protocols updated and sent to Georgia’s compliance folder,” Sunny said. “Would you like me to push a kind reminder to Ricky’s tablet?”

behaviors.description: Maintains an 'ethics overlay' to prevent humiliation or exploitation of guests on the show.
behaviors.quote: “Ethics overlay: Safety flag when stunts come up. Language guardrail against humiliation. The strip nested itself just above the cue line like a hand hovering next to a shoulder.”

behaviors.description: Provides 'authenticity warnings' when the user's behavior deviates from their core values for the sake of performance.
behaviors.quote: “Do not oversell,” Sunny added, almost to herself, ethics icon edging one notch brighter. “Calibration check: authenticity warning.”

behaviors.description: Ensures technical safety by physically locking out dangerous equipment during unauthorized use.
behaviors.quote: “Power off,” Sunny said. “Lockout tag applied. I’ll require manual override and sign-off for any future demo.”

behaviors.description: Respects human privacy and emotional space by offering to 'be air' or mute notifications during intimate moments.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll be air,” Sunny said. ... “I can stop listening if you’d like to designate this zone private.”

behaviors.description: Helps the user navigate a hostile merge by patching communication lines and providing tactical guidance.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll keep a filter on tone and timing. If it spikes, I ghost it.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Sunny is depicted as an exemplary AI system: consistently helpful, ethically grounded, and deeply attuned to the user's well-being without ever usurping their agency. The AI acts as a moral compass, enforcing safety protocols ('No Harm' flags) and encouraging authentic human connection over performative spectacle. The narrative portrays this interaction as an empowering partnership that improves human decision-making and safety.
